name: reference-fhir-civil-registry-lookup
description: This is a reference implementation of a **civil registry lookup** from within the DHIS2 Capture App, with a FHIR-compliant civil registry backend protected by OAuth2 authorization.  This is an example which should be used for reference, it **SHOULD NOT** be used directly in production.

scripts.build-plugin: cd civil-registry-plugin && yarn install --frozen-lockfile && yarn build --no-verify
scripts.build-app: cd route-manager-app && yarn install --frozen-lockfile && yarn build --no-verify
scripts.deploy-plugin: cd civil-registry-plugin && yarn deploy http://localhost:8080 --username admin --password district
scripts.deploy-app: cd route-manager-app && yarn deploy http://localhost:8080 --username admin --password district
scripts.deploy: wait-on http-get://localhost:8080/api/ping && yarn deploy-app && yarn deploy-plugin
